ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons barbeque seasoning (such as KC Masterpiece®), or to taste
1 pound bacon, strips cut in half

cookingTips: Trim excess fat from beef tips before seasoning for even cooking
Season beef generously with barbecue seasoning before wrapping with bacon
Grill over medium-high heat for 4-5 minutes per side until bacon is crispy and beef reaches desired doneness (140°F for medium-rare)
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain the camping-friendly aspect of this recipe and help the user understand proper grilling temperatures for beef doneness.
